Title: Red 
Original title: Red 
Country: USA 
USA release: 15/10/2010 
Released in Spain: 28/01/2011 
Released on DVD (rental): 01/06/2011 
Studio: Summit Entertainment 
Director: Robert Schwentke 
Screenwriter: Erich Hoeber, Jon Hoeber 
Starring: Bruce Willis, Morgan Freeman, John Malkovich, Helen Mirren, Karl Urban, Mary-Louise Parker, Brian Cox, Julian McMahon, Richard Dreyfuss 
Rating: Not recommended for children under 7 years 


Synopsis: 
Frank Moses (Willis) is a former covert agent of the CIA who now leads a quiet and solitary existence ... until the day that a team of murderers appears determined to destroy him. In a desperate attempt to survive and find out what they want to make him disappear, Frank meets his former team, "happily" retired: the ever-faithful Joe (Freeman), the disturbed Marvin (Malkovich) and the lethal Victoria (Mirren). 

Will have to muster all their cunning, experience and teamwork to keep one step ahead of his deadly pursuers and stay alive. The team, along with Sarah (Mary-Louise Parker), a "civil" to her relationship with Frank has been compromised, undertakes a mission impossible that will cross the country to infiltrate the top secret CIA headquarters , where they uncover a major conspiracy in the history of United States Government. 

Production notes: 
- Based on the DC Comics graphic novel of the same name by author Warren Ellis.
